name: On A Day Before The Storms
description:
the first in a small series based on conversations in the house, set to a remix of “4337” by E.R.A. some years ago

approximately 76-second unfolding audiovisual loop 

(please note: the things take time)

collectors are welcome to use what they hear and see in their own work if interested, consistent with an Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0) license

(contact us for high resolution files)

as with other work from @HouseOfTheModel, a portion of proceeds will be donated to The Marshall Project, a nonpartisan, nonprofit news organization that seeks to create & sustain a sense of national urgency about the criminal justice system; this is done on a quarterly basis

*special acknowledgement to @ShawnChiki for sharing some of his photoshop insights with us
